name: Burnout-Modified
description:
Original Game created by 

Jackson Lott

Esela Holguin

Alan Cowan

Devyn Cole

Shannia Cole

Modified Code created by

Dean Roeser

Code Modifications

- Added feature where light grows dimmer as time goes on

- Added flame objects the player can pick up to reset their candle

- Fixed general game bugs including player and enemy gravity when falling off a ledge

- Adjusted brightness values and enemy/platform placements to make the game more playable

This game was modified for the B453 Game Development Class at Indiana University. I make no claim to have created the original code.
